availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David F. Orr (Brown County, IL, cooper )

body.p: Brown County, Illinois, cooper. Illinois native. Son of Henry C. Orr and Mary Orr. Student in Cumberland County, Illinois, in 1850. Cooper in Cooperstown in 1860. Cooper in Brown County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Cumberland County, Woodbury, p. 270A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Brown County, Cooperstown, p. 743.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Brown County, IL, July 1863, p. 435.
